machine_start_gcode.default_value:
; Fokoos Custom Start G-code
G21 ; set units to millimeters 
G92 E0 ; Reset Extruder
G28 ; Home all axes
G1 Z2.0 F600 ; Move Z Axis up little to prevent scratching of Heat Bed
G1 X2.0 Y20 Z0.3 F3000 ; Move to start position
G1 X2.0 Y200.0 Z0.3 F3000 E15 ; Draw the first line
G1 X2.4 Y200.0 Z0.3 F3000 ; Move to side a little
G1 X2.4 Y20 Z0.3 F3000.0 E30 ; Draw the second line
G92 E0 ; Reset Extruder
G1 Z2.0 F600 ; Move Z Axis up little to prevent scratching of Heat Bed
G1 X5 Y20 Z0.3 F3000 ; Move over to prevent blob squish

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G91 ;Relative positioning
G1 E-2 F3000 ;Retract a bit
G1 E-2 Z0.2 F3000 ;Retract and raise Z
G1 X5 Y5 F3000 ;Wipe out
G1 Z10 ;Raise Z more
G90 ;Absolute positioning
G1 X0 Y{machine_depth} ;Present print
M84 X Y E ;Disable all steppers but Z
